mapper.select: SELECT WH_LOC_ID CODE_ID ,WH_LOC_CODE CODE_CODE ,DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) CODE_NAME FROM SYS0028M WHERE WH_LOC_GB = 01 ORDER BY CODE_NAME

SELECT l43m.BOM ,l43m.ALTRTIV_BOM ,l43m.PLANT ,l43m.BOM_USE ,l43m.MATRL_NO ,s26m.STK_ID ,s26m.STK_CODE ,s26m.STK_DESC STK_DESC ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = s26m.STK_CTGRY_ID) STK_CTGRY_NM , (SELECT CODE_ID FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = s26m.STK_TYPE_ID) STK_TYPE_ID , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = s26m.STK_TYPE_ID) STK_TYPE_NM , (SELECT NAME FROM SYS0038M WHERE STUS_CODE_ID = s26m.STUS_CODE_ID) STUS_CODE_NM , CASE WHEN s26m.STK_TYPE_ID = 61 THEN (SELECT MAX(ct.CODE_NAME) FROM SAL0016M sp, SYS0013M ct WHERE sp.APP_TYPE_ID = 67 AND SP.MEM_PAC_ID = 0 AND sp.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND sp.UOM_ID = ct.CODE_ID AND sp.STK_ID = s26m.STK_ID) ELSE (SELECT MAX(ct.CODE_NAME) FROM SAL0016M sp, SYS0013M ct WHERE sp.APP_TYPE_ID <> 61 AND SP.MEM_PAC_ID = 0 AND sp.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND sp.UOM_ID = ct.CODE_ID AND sp.STK_ID = s26m.STK_ID) END UOM_NAME , s26m.IS_SIRIM IS_SIRIM , s26m.IS_NCV IS_NCV , s26m.NET_WT NET_WT , s26m.GROS_WT GROS_WT , s26m.MEASURE_CBM MEASURE_CBM FROM LOG0043M l43m, SYS0026M s26m WHERE 1 = 1 AND l43m.MATRL_NO = s26m.STK_CODE AND l43m.BOM = #{bom}
